get.summary: Ping the service to verify that that it is available

put.summary: Retrieves the seed list and deletes the results
put.description: Step 3. Retrieve the concept-expanded seed list and delete the results.

parameters.name: jobid
parameters.description: ID returned from the upload path.

get.summary: Get the status of a job
get.description: Step 2. Query the status of the job created with the POST /upload operation.

parameters.name: jobid
parameters.description: The jobid returned from the POST /upload operation.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset to run against.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A conceptual classification of the seed terms.

parameters.name: seeds
parameters.description: List of terms to seed the concept expansion.

put.summary: Submit feedback on the Concept Expansion service
put.description: The feedback API allows you to provide information on how well the service performed.  The feedback is used to further improve the service and future results.

parameters.name: Basic Authorization
parameters.description: Base64 Basic Auth

parameters.name: Feedback information
parameters.description: JSON Data

put.summary: Submit feedback on the Language Identification service
put.description: The feedback API allows you to provide information on how well the service performed.  The feedback is used to further improve the service and future results.

parameters.name: Basic Authorization
parameters.description: Base64 Basic Auth

parameters.name: Feedback information
parameters.description: JSON Data

post.description: You can detect the language of text that is encoded as UTF-8 by using the Watson Language Identification (LID) service.

parameters.name: rt
parameters.description: Return type. The content type to accept.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: Language identification of the text.

parameters.name: txt
parameters.description: The text that you want to process. Must be encoded as UTF-8.

put.summary: Submit feedback on the Machine Translation service
put.description: The feedback API allows you to provide information on how well the service performed.  The feedback is used to further improve the service and future results.

parameters.name: Basic Authorization
parameters.description: Base64 Basic Auth

parameters.name: Feedback information
parameters.description: JSON Data

post.summary: Sends text to the server for translation

parameters.name: rt
parameters.description: The format of the translated content that you want.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: Language identifiers. Uses the ISO language and country code in the form mt-<from-language>-<to-language>.

parameters.name: txt
parameters.description: The text that you want to translate. Must be encoded as UTF-8.

put.summary: Submit feedback on the Message Resonance service

parameters.name: Basic Authorization
parameters.description: Base64 Basic Auth

parameters.name: Feedback information
parameters.description: JSON Data

get.summary: Retrieves the ringscore for terms within a community
get.description: The ringscore has the range 0 - 99. The larger the ringscore, the more effective the term.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: The ID of the community to which the ringscore applies. Use GET /v1/datasets to retrieve the communities. If dataset is not included, the service returns an aggregate ring score.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The term to use for the ringscore

put.summary: Submit feedback on the Question Answer Gateway service
put.description: The feedback API allows you to provide information on how well the service performed. The feedback is used to further improve the service and future results.

parameters.name: Basic Authorization
parameters.description: Base64 Basic Auth

parameters.name: Feedback information
parameters.description: JSON Data

get.summary: Pings the service to verify that it is available

post.summary: Sends a question to an instance of Watson
post.description: Accepts a Question and Answer REST API request and routes it to the Watson instance identified by the
path parameter. The response includes answers and supporting evidence.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic authentication that uses system id and password

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifies the instance or domain that Watson is trained for

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The container for the submitted question and its associated information.Example with required elements:{   question: {      questionText:Question text here   }}

parameters.name: X-SyncTimeout
parameters.description: Specifies how long the Watson pipeline waits for a response

get.summary: Returns the list of supported Watson domains

put.summary: Submit feedback on the Relationship Extraction service
put.description: The feedback API allows you to provide information on how well the service performed.  The feedback is used to further improve the service and future results.

parameters.name: Basic Authorization
parameters.description: Base64 Basic Auth

parameters.name: Feedback information
parameters.description: JSON Data

post.description: You can extract useful information from text by using the IBM Watson Relationship Extractor service.

parameters.name: rt
parameters.description: Return type. The content type to accept.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: Language identifier. es refers to Spanish, and en refers to English.

parameters.name: txt
parameters.description: The text that you want to process. Must be encoded as UTF-8.
